name: Nucleux (Alpha)
description:
**EARLY ALPHA**

First spot of a game idea I had. 

Nucleux is Polybius-styled game. 

The concept of the game is to destroy the Nucleux and their Fractals all around the galaxy.

This version is just the gameplay test and all the sprites and images are placeholders.

**TO DO LIST**

  • Create more music
  • Create more sprites
  • Replace placeholders
  • Create more levels

**ALREADY DONE**

  • Game Translation (Alpha 0.1.1)

Are you an artist and want to participate? Just contact me :)
